\documentclass[grado3]{LEMA-Tikz-IM}
\begin{document}
% \usetikzlibrary{positioning} % for relative note placement (right = of)


\input{act-comparaDivideHasta100-tarjetas-estilo.tex}

\def\textoTarjetaA{$78\div 6$}
\def\textoTarjetaB{$84\div 7$}
\def\textoTarjetaC{$68\div 4$}
\def\textoTarjetaD{$65\div 5$}
\def\textoTarjetaE{$90\div 6$}
\def\textoTarjetaF{$45\div 15$}
\def\textoTarjetaG{$57\div 19$}
\def\textoTarjetaH{$72\div 18$}
\def\textoTarjetaI{$52\div 13$}
\def\textoTarjetaJ{$84\div 12$}


\begin{tikzpicture}
\node[tarjeta] (tarjetaA) {\textoTarjetaA};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaA] (tarjetaB) {\textoTarjetaB};

\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaA] (tarjetaC) {\textoTarjetaC};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaC] (tarjetaD) {\textoTarjetaD};


\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaC] (tarjetaE) {\textoTarjetaE};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaE] (tarjetaF) {\textoTarjetaF};

\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaE] (tarjetaG) {\textoTarjetaG};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaG] (tarjetaH) {\textoTarjetaH};

\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaG] (tarjetaI) {\textoTarjetaI};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaI] (tarjetaJ) {\textoTarjetaJ};

\foreach \tarj in {A,...,J}{
  \node[below right, font=\scriptsize, align=left] at (tarjeta\tarj.north west){Compara: Divide hasta 100};
  % \node[below right] at (tarjeta\tarj.north west) {\tarj};
}
\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
